maqras.text: meux chan fa di tækyæk xxk
læa man di cheuxfang phracea khxng man læa man ca txng kratha chen nan
læa meux phændin thuk hı phæ kwang
læa man di pldpeluxng sing thi xyu nı man xxk ma læa man k wang pela
læa man di cheuxfang phracea khxng man læa man ca txng kratha chen nan
xo mnusʹy xey thæcring cea txng phakpheiyr pi su phracea khxng cea xyang thrhd xdthn læw cea cung ca phbphra xngkh
swn phu thi thuk yun banthuk khxng khea hı thang beuxng khwa khxng khea
khea k ca thuk chara sxbswn xyang ngayday
læa khea ca klab pi yang khrxbkhraw khxng khea dwy khwam dicı
læa swn phu thi thuk yun banthuk khxng khea hı thang beuxnghlang khxng khea
læw khea k ca rxng reiyk hakhwam hayna
læa khea ca kheapi nı pelw pheling
thæcring khea (nı lok dun ya) khey wa reing xyu kab khrxbkhraw khxng khea
thæcring khea khid wa khea ca mi klab ma (ha xallxhˌ) xik penxankhad
phung ru theid wa thæcring phracea khxng khea thrng sxdsxng khea xyu semx
kha khx yunyan kar saban dwy yam tawanyxsæng
læa dwy klangkhun thi man rwm hı chumnum kan
læa dwy dwng canthr meux man tem dwng
nænxn phwk cea ca txng phechiy kab sphaph hnung hlangcak xik sphaph hnung
mi xari keid khun kæ phwk khea phwk khea cung mi sraththa
læa meux xalkurxan di thuk xan hı phwk khea fang phwk khea k mi suyu d
tæ trngkankham phwk ptiseth sraththa nan phwk khea mi yxm sraththa
læa xallxh thrng ru di ying nı sing thi phwk khea pidbang wi
dangnan cea (muhammad) cng cæng kæ phwk khea thung kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd
Nxkcak brrda phu sraththa læa kratha khwam di thanghlay sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal (kar txbthæn) xyang mimi sinsud
khx saban dwy chan fa thi keluxnklad dwy dwngdaw
læa dwy wan thi thuk sayya wi
læa dwy phu pen phyan læa phu thi thuk pen phyan
brrda ceakhxng hlumphrang thuk sap chæng
fi thi tem pi dwy cheuxpheling
khna thi phwk khea nang xyu trng hnafi
læa phwk khea ruhen pen phyan tx sing thi brrda luknxng kratha kab brrda phu sraththa
læa phwk khea midi kækhæn khea hela nan wentæ wa khea hela nan sraththa tx xallxhˌ phuthrng xanac phuthrng di rab kar srrseriy
phu sung krrmsiththi hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin pen khxng phraxngkh læa xallxhˌ nan thrng pen phyan tx thuk sing xyang

thæcring phwk thi prahatprahar brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying læw phwk khea midi sanuk phidk lab taw nan phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ hæng nrk yahannam læa phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ hæng kar phea him
thæcring brrda phu sraththa læa prakxb khwam di thanghlay phwk khea ca di rab swn swrrkh hlakhlay n beuxng lang khxng man mi lana hlay say hil phan nan khux chaychna xan hıy hlwng
thæcring kar lngthosʹ xyang runræng hæng phracea nan khængkraw ying nak
thæcring phraxngkh khux phuthrng hı bangkeid khrang ræk læa thrng hı klab fun khunchiph khun xik
læa phraxngkh khux phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng rak khır prani
ceakhxng ballangk xan rungrocn
phuthrng kratha xyang dedkhad tam thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh
di mi reuxngraw khxng phirphl mayang cea læw michı hrux
khxng fir xea nˌ læa sa mud
ying pi kwa nan brrda phu ptiseth sraththa yang mi yxm cheux (khwam cring)
læa xallxhˌ thrng hxmlxm phwk khea thuk dan
michı chen nan dxk thi phwk khea mi yxm cheuxthux khux ku rxa nxan rungrocn
xyu nı phæn caruk thi thuk keb raksʹa wi
khx saban dwy chan fa læa (dwngdaw) thima nı wela khakhun
Læa xari lea ca thahı cea ru di wa sing thima nı wela khakhun nan khux xari
khux dwngdaw thi prakay sæng
mimi chiwit dı (xyu doy laphang) wentæ mi phu fea raksʹa man
dangnan mnusʹy cng tirtrxng du si wa khea thuk bangkeid ma cak xari
khea thuk bangkeid ma cak na thi phung xxk ma
man xxk ma cak kraduksanhlang (khxng chay) læa kraduk hnaxk (khxng hying)
thæcring phraxngkh thrng samarth xyang nænxn thi ca hı khea klab ma xik (khux fun khunchiph)
wan thi sing renlab thanghlay ca thuk peidphey
dangnan khea ca mimi phlang dı «læa mimi phu chwyhelux dı «
khx saban dwy chan fa thi hlang na fn
læa phændin thi pri xxk (hı meld phuch ngxkngey)
thæ cring xalkurxan nan khux phra daras thi canæk (rahwang khwam cring kab khwam thec)
læa xalkurxan nan michı reuxng ri sara
thæcring phwk khea kalang wangphæn kan xyu
læa kha k wangphæn kar xyu
dangnan cea (muhammad) cng phxnprn hı brrda phu ptiseth sraththa theid kha k ca phxnprn hı kæ phwk khea raya hnung
